about.title: About

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text:
Copyright Â© 2024 Roche Diagnostics International Ltd. All rights reserved.

IVD Testing Platform is protected by contract law, copyright laws and international treaties.

IVD Testing Platform is licensed for use between Roche Diagnostics International Ltd and the licensee, and only users authorized there under are permitted to access and use the software. Unauthorized use and distribution may result in civil and criminal penalties.

trademark.title: Trademarks
trademark.text:
IVD Testing Platform is a trademark of Roche.

All other product names and trademarks are property of their respective owners.

openSource.title: Open Source and Commercial Software
openSource.text: IVD Testing Platform might contain components or modules that are Open Source or commercial software programs.

useStatement.title: For use statement
useStatement.text:
IVD Testing Platform is an application/integration layer to transport data from partner IT systems to the laboratory and vice versa.

The IVD Testing Platform enables healthcare providers to order IVD Tests and see test results from a range of different diagnostic services.

The IVD Testing Platform will offer an order entry and result lookup capability in case an integration into the Healthcare IT infrastructure is not possible.

IVD Testing Platform enables the patient or the healthcare provider to select a preferred location for the sample collection.

This platform/product is not intended for the diagnosis, screening, monitoring or treatment of patients.

By clicking on Confirm you will lose all the information already set in the test order.
